name: rse-text-decoder
description: A tool to convert text characters into the corresponding codepoints in the character encoding of the generation III Pokemon games.

scripts.start: npm run build && npx serve dist/
scripts.build: npx shx cp -r src/html/. dist/ && npx tsc -noEmit && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --sourcemap --target=esnext --outfile=dist/index.js
